attributes.action: Put a statue of Isaac Newell in Strood, Kent
attributes.additional_details: Because this will get peoples attention. The man did something for the good of people using sport. He has helped the world of Football and should be recognised
attributes.background: Put a statue of Isaac Newell in Strood Kent. He took Football to Argentina! Newells Old Boys is named after him and many famous players like Messi & Maradona have played there.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about erecting a statue along the lines you propose are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
